item.title: Differences between working in university research and a tech startup
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: A comparison of the differences between working in university research and working in a technology startup.

item.title: How universities can help develop researchers' post-university careers
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: My account of a new and intensive career development programme for postdoctoral researchers leaving university.

item.title: Types of data scientist
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: My take on the “Analyzing the Analyzers” report by Harlan Harris and co-authors.
